description: Requires 7 buildings to store and secure various quantities of assorted hazardous chemicals in support of Canadian Army training courses.
full_summary:
=====================================

# W3508-230199: Outdoor Hazardous Chemical Storage Buildings

### Contract Details

| Category | Description             | Value                                    |
|---------|-------------------------|------------------------------------------|
| Prize    | USA$                                 |                          |
| Duration | July 7, 2023 to Feb. 29, 2024       |

### Tender Information

* Tender Number        : W3508-230199
* Refer Number        : WS4007315664-Doc4031690050
* Amendment Number    : 3
* Date of Publication: May 30, 2023
* Closing Date        : July 12, 2023, 14:00 hrs EDT
* Status              : *Cancelled*

### Materials and Services

* Prefabricated commercial and industrial buildings and structures

### Evaluation Criteria

* Lowest Price

### Trade Agreements

* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement

### Evaluation and Awarding Process

All proposals will be evaluated based on the lowest price. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by July 12, 2023, at 14:00 hrs EDT.  All bids submitted after 14:00 hrs EDT will be declared non-responsive.

### Tender Number Description

The proposed MINISTÈRE DES TRAVAUX PUBLICS ET DES SERVICES GOUVERNEMENTAUX (TPSGC) is requesting the purchase of storage buildings with the following specifications:

 #### Storage Capacity
 All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by July 12, 2023, at 14:00 hrs EDT. All bids submitted after 14:00 hrs EDT will be declared non-responsive.

 #### Exterior Storage
 All events should be only outside, as the proposed ministr n't provide any interior areas.

Security measures will be required for secure storage of chemicals.

### Service Location

The units will be required in the 4th Canadian Division Training Centre (4 CDTC)

### End Use Entities

* Department of National Defence (DND)
*  Ministry of Defense (MDN, Canada)

# Contact Information

* Name: Terri Stork
*  Address: Website 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage 
* Email: terri.stork @ tspgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
